agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: International Relations & Economic Development TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Monday, April 8, 2019 PLACE: E2.014 CHAIR: Rep. Rafael Anchia The committee will meet to hear public testimony on the following: HB 1478 Rosenthal Relating to a prohibition of employment discrimination on the basis of reproductive decisions and certain employment agreements limiting reproductive decisions. HB 1855 Bowers | et al. Relating to restrictions on hours of employment for children; creating criminal offenses. HB 1911 Meza Relating to the creation of a low-interest loan program for entrepreneurs with physical or mental disabilities. HB 2784 Phelan Relating to the creation of the Texas Industrial Workforce Apprenticeship grant program. HB 3511 VanDeaver Relating to the creation of the Commission on Texas Workforce of the Future. HB 3565 White Relating to the creation of certain pilot programs to encourage economic and educational opportunities in certain regions of this state. HB 3847 Calanni Relating to requiring reasonable workplace accommodations for and prohibiting discrimination against employees or applicants for employment with limitations related to pregnancy, childbirth, or a related medical condition. HB 3942 Perez Relating to establishing a program to assist small businesses by increasing access to capital. Bills deleted after last posting: HB 995 HB 1559 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
